titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation, for dissolving this present parliament, and declaring the speedy calling another
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1694-1702 : William III)
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, and the Executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
"Given at Our Court at Kensington the Nineteenth Day of December, 1700. In the Twelfth Year of Our Reign."
Postpones the meeting of Parliament from 16 January to 6 February, 1701.

person.persName: Charles Bill, and the Executrix of Thomas Newcomb, deceas'd
